text: Zhongren a! Ruguo nimen duiyu fuhuo de shi hai zai huaiyi zhi zhong, name, wo que yi chuangzaole nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong yi xiao di jingye, ji yong yikuai ningxie, ji yong wanzheng de he bu wanzheng de rou tuan, yibian wo dui nimen chanming (daoli). Wo shi wo suo yu de (tai'er) zai zigong li anju yige dingqi, ranhou, wo shi nimen chusheng wei ying'er, ranhou (wo rang nimen huozhe), yibian nimen dadao chengnian. Nimen zhong you yaozhe de; you fu fan yu zui lie de nianji de, yibian ta zai you zhishi zhihou, shenme ye bu zhidao. Ni kan dadi shi bumao de, dang wo shi yushui jiang yu dadi de shihou, ta jiu huodong he pengzhang, erqie shengchu ge zhong meili de zhiwu
